author: azlankonma
title: KONMAHOOD - Defining Communities.
description: A true democratic community platform to learn, synergize & share opinions can only exist in a decentralized space. Problem? It doesn't yet.
solution: Konmahood is where we plan to build strong communities governed by the DAO. An exclusive space for users to form tribes, learn and be free!
experience: Konma has an existing community forum used for learning where different niches are divided into tribes like the blockchain & crypto tribes.
